description: Always a good choice for gourmet cuisine, this lovely restaurant within the Hotel Mare boasts a fine location with a garden for summer dining overlooking the beach and the sea. Whether you’re soaking up the views outside or sitting comfortably in the attractive contemporary-style dining room, it’s Simone Perata’s cuisine that will convince you that you’ve chosen the best place in town. The menu is teeming with delicious dishes made from top-quality ingredients (especially fish, such as the delicious whitebait with grilled artichokes and green curry sauce), all prepared with a modern twist and beautifully presented. The excellent wine list (including a few vintage labels) provides the perfect accompaniment to your dining experience.
